title: Water skiing at the 2013 Mediterranean Games
text:
The <a href="water%20skiing">water skiing</a> competitions at the <a href="2013%20Mediterranean%20Games">2013 Mediterranean Games</a> in <a href="Mersin">Mersin</a> took place between 21 June and 23 June at the <a href="Atat%C3%BCrk%20Park">Mersin Atatürk Park</a>. 
Athletes competed in 2 events. Tricks and wakeboard competitions were not held because too few nations applied. 
Medal summary.
Medal table.
